snippet: After a Microsoft-sponsored bake-off that put its Hotmail service a hair ahead of Google's Gmail in spam blocking, Google has stepped forward with its own statistics demonstrating that Gmail is the antispam leader.
abstract: After a Microsoft-sponsored bake-off that put its Hotmail service a hair ahead of Google's Gmail in spam blocking, Google has stepped forward with its own statistics demonstrating that Gmail is the antispam leader.

headline.main: Gmail Fires Back in the War on Spam
